tool.name: NoiseFilterGaussian
tool.description: Removes noise from profile spectra by using Gaussian filter (on uniform as well as non-uniform data).
tool.command:
NoiseFilterGaussian
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_threads: -threads $param_threads #end if #if $param_algorithm_gaussian_width: -algorithm:gaussian_width $param_algorithm_gaussian_width #end if #if $param_algorithm_ppm_tolerance: -algorithm:ppm_tolerance $param_algorithm_ppm_tolerance #end if #if $param_algorithm_use_ppm_tolerance: -algorithm:use_ppm_tolerance #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_version: -version "$adv_opts.param_version" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_processOption: -processOption $adv_opts.param_processOption #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log: -log "$adv_opts.param_log" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_debug: -debug $adv_opts.param_debug #end if #if $adv_opts.param_no_progress: -no_progress #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_test: -test #end if #end if

param.name: param_threads
param.label: Sets the number of threads allowed to be used by the TOPP tool

param.name: param_algorithm_gaussian_width
param.label: Use a gaussian filter width which has approximately the same width as your mass peaks (FWHM in m/z)

param.name: param_algorithm_ppm_tolerance
param.label: Gaussian width, depending on the m/z position
param.help:
(-ppm_tolerance)
The higher the value, the wider the peak and therefore the wider the gaussian

param.name: param_algorithm_use_ppm_tolerance
param.label: If true, instead of the gaussian_width value, the ppm_tolerance is used
param.help: (-use_ppm_tolerance) The gaussian is calculated in each step anew, so this is much slower

param.name: param_version
param.label: Version of the tool that generated this parameters file

param.name: param_processOption
param.label: Whether to load all data and process them in-memory or whether to process the data on the fly (lowmemory) without loading the whole file into memory first

param.name: param_log
param.label: Name of log file (created only when specified)

param.name: param_no_progress
param.label: Disables progress logging to command line

param.name: param_test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Removes noise from profile spectra by using Gaussian filter (on uniform as well as non-uniform data).
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_NoiseFilterGaussian.html
